alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 01 at 9:21PM CST until March 02 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following counties, Giles and Lawrence. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 921 PM CST, emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lawrenceburg, Pulaski, Loretto, Ardmore, St. Joseph, Elkton, Minor Hill, Ethridge, Lynnville, Goodspring, Leoma, Prospect, Westpoint, Frankewing and Iron City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
